subTitleCarService.descr: The best service for maintenance and repair of cars and trucks

subTitleHostel.descr: There is a comfortable hostel on the territory, where drivers and guests can relax, spend the night, or simply take a shower and prepare dinner.

subTitleTirParking.descrFisrt: On the territory of our TIR parking lot for trucks there are conditions for safe and comfortable parking of vehicles.
subTitleTirParking.descrSecond: Parking for truckers is under close supervision.

howWeWork.title: How we work
howWeWork.decrOne: We value each client and provide quality service in Chernivtsi
howWeWork.decrTwo: So here are a few points so you can easily find out how we work in order to take the car to our service.

aboutUsPage.CoverageMapTitle: Map of coverage of key routes
aboutUsPage.AboutUsSubTitle: Our mission is to make logistics simple, transparent and efficient for each client
aboutUsPage.AboutUsMainTextPt1: TomtransLogistic LLC is a modern logistics company with its own fleet of vehicles and services that provides reliable and timely transportation for businesses of all sizes. For more than 30 years, the company has been providing freight forwarding services for the transportation of goods by trucks both in international traffic and in Ukraine.
aboutUsPage.AboutUsMainTextPt2: The company has its own fleet of more than 40 vehicles, its own car service and spare parts for full technical control of transport. A team of logistics and transportation professionals accompanies clients from planning to delivery, ensuring reliable and timely transportation.
